getInstance

public static CommentManager getInstance()

refresh

public void refresh(CommentListModel clm,
                    BrowseActivity mActivity,
                    CommentModel viewingComment)
Handles loading comments for the view into its comment list model. Attempts to load from the web else it loads from the cache.

refreshMyComments

public void refreshMyComments(CommentListModel clm)
Refreshes a comment list model with a list of the users authored comments.

Parameters:
clm - The clm to refresh.

refreshMyBookmarks

Refreshes a comment list model with a list of the users bookmarked comments.

Parameters:
clm - The clm to refresh.

refreshMyFavourites

public void refreshMyFavourites(CommentListModel clm)
Refreshes a comment list model with a list of the users bookmarked comments.

Parameters:

getComment

public CommentModel getComment(java.lang.String mParentID,
                               java.lang.String EsID)
Retrieves a single comment from the cache.

Parameters:
mParentID - The parent ID of the comment we want
EsID - The ID of the comment we want
Returns:
The comment if it exists otherwise expect null.

getCommentByComboID

public CommentModel getCommentByComboID(java.lang.String ID)
Used to retrieve a comment from the myComments array in the user class. Assumes that you somehow know the comment already exists in the array. If it doesn't it returns null and you will get null pointer exceptions if you do not account for this.

Parameters:
EsID - The ID of the comment we want
Returns:
The comment OR null if not found.

updateComment

public void updateComment(CommentModel comment)
Handles updating a comment. This involves pushing the comment to the Internet AND updating the cache.

Parameters:
comment - The updated comment

newReply

public java.lang.Thread newReply(CommentModel comment)
Handles adding a new reply. This involves pushing it to the Internet and into the cache.

Parameters:
comment - The new replys
Returns:
The thread the push is running on

newTopLevel

public java.lang.Thread newTopLevel(CommentModel comment)
Handles adding a new Top level. This involves pushing it to the Internet and into the cache.

Parameters:
comment - The new reply
Returns:
The thread the push is running on

newReply

public void newReply(CommentModel newComment,
                     Context context,
                     User myUser)
Creates a new reply comment. The comment is pushed to the web and added to the local my comments list.

Parameters:
newComment - the new reply level comment
context - An activity context
myUser - the user profile to add the newly created reply comment to.
